title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.29 - Indemnity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.29 - Indemnity

State Regulations

The holder of a permit for use of a berth at a terminal
shall indemnify and save harmless the Port Authority, its commissioners, officers and/or employees, from any and all claims and demands including, but
without limitation thereto, claims and demands or third persons caused by the
negligent acts or omissions of the permittee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
